name: Wave or Die
description:
Find and eliminate enemies of the state.

Discern between enemies and citizens by their different waves.

We expect results.

A game made for the 2017 Global Games Jam.

The controls are:

"Enter" - Fullscreen

Keyboard:

"Arrow Keys" - Movement

"Z" - Run

"X" - Shoot

Gamepad:

"Numpad/Joystick" - Movement

"Left Trigger" - Fire

"Right Trigger" - Run

"A" - Jump
